title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Smartphone where Share of respondents is 10.0.
The lowest category is found at Passport where Share of respondents is 4.0.
The highest value at Smartphone is almost 2.5 times larger than the minimum value of Passport.
The highest value at Smartphone is almost 2.5 times larger than the minimum value of Passport.
The difference between the max Response Smartphone and min Response Passport is 6.0.
